entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
